title: Local Official: Charleston Residents Somber In Wake Of 'Unthinkable' Shooting
teaser: For the latest on how Charleston, S.C., residents are reacting to the shooting at a local church, which killed nine people, Renee Montagne speaks with Charleston County Council member Henry Darby.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
